description: Poetic StrapBack is built on a rigid platform that will both offer protection and convinience for your NEW iPad!  With the unique built in hand strap on the inside of the case, you'll enjoy the added comfort of surfing the web or emailing on the go, with this smart protective case.  The rigid design has a sold interior built over the front for screen protection and a split back for multiple stand options in landscape mode.  Enjoy the comfort, style and convenience of the StrapBack by Poetic.Poetic, an Exact Design Inc Brand, warrants the Poetic Brand of Products against defects in material or workmanship for a period3 (three) Yearsfrom the original date of purchase of the product by a consumer through an authorized Poetic dealer. Poetic does not warrant, and is not responsible for, any smart phone, tablet or other device made by any manufacturer other than Poetic. If a defect arises in the materials or workmanship warranted by Poetic, Poetic will replace that unit as long as it falls within the warranty constraints.The Poetic name, logo, all product names, customer graphics, trademarks and service marks appearing on the Poetic website unless otherwise noted, are service marks, trademarks (whether registered or not) and/or trade dress of Poetic brand.Multi-Colors Available:Black Color -- ASIN:   B007HBLXI8Hot Pink Color -- ASIN:   B007PW2B76Blue Color -- ASIN:     B007PW2BBWPurple Color -- ASIN:   B007PW2B2QWhite Color -- ASIN:   B007PW2BIU
title: Poetic StrapBack Rigid Leather Wraped Case with Multi-Stand Options for The NEW iPad (3rd generation) / iPad 3 / iPad HD BLACK
